content: ओष्ठः [उष्यते उष्णाहारेण, उष्-कर्मणि थन् <ls>Uṇ. 2. 4</ls>] A lip (lower or upper); द्वावोष्ठौ छेदयेन्नृपः <ls>Ms. 8. 282</ls>; अधर°, बिंब°. --ष्ठी A creeper bearing a red fruit to which the lip is commonly compared (बिंबफल). In <ab>comp.</ab> the अ or आ of words before ओष्ठ may be optionally dropped, and the <ab>fem.</ab> may end in आ or ई; as बिंबो(बौ) ष्ठा-ष्ठी. [<ab>cf.</ab> <ab>L.</ab> {%ostium%}].
